statements: SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE total_attempts > 100;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE successful_attempts < total_attempts;
SELECT strategy_name, total_attempts, successful_attempts FROM conflict_resolution_strategies ORDER BY total_attempts DESC, successful_attempts ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE success_rate > 75;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE total_attempts < 100 AND successful_attempts > 50;
SELECT strategy_name FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE total_attempts BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_strategies FROM conflict_resolution_strategies;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_data WHERE resolved_conflicts > 10 ORDER BY resolved_conflicts DESC;
SELECT data_id, strategy_id, resolved_conflicts + unresolved_conflicts AS total_conflicts FROM conflict_data;
SELECT strategy_name, AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies GROUP BY strategy_name HAVING AVG(success_rate) > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT strategy_name, CONCAT('Resolved:', resolved_conflicts, ' Unresolved:', unresolved_conflicts) AS conflict_stats FROM conflict_data WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM conflict_data ORDER BY resolved_conflicts DESC, unresolved_conflicts ASC;
SELECT MAX(success_rate) AS max_success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies ORDER BY success_rate DESC
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE success_rate > 80
SELECT * FROM conflict_data ORDER BY date_inserted ASC
SELECT strategy_id, COUNT(id) AS total_conflicts FROM conflict_data GROUP BY strategy_id HAVING total_conflicts > 10
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE success_rate > 0.8
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC
SELECT id, outcome FROM conflict_data WHERE date_inserted >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_inserted ASC

SELECT strategy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_conflicts FROM conflict_resolution_strategies JOIN conflict_data ON conflict_resolution_strategies.id = conflict_data.strategy_id GROUP BY strategy_name ORDER BY total_conflicts DESC

SELECT strategy_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM conflict_resolution_strategies JOIN strategy_feedback ON conflict_resolution_strategies.id = strategy_feedback.strategy_id GROUP BY strategy_name HAVING avg_rating > 3
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionStrategies;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM ConflictResolutionStrategies;
SELECT * FROM ConflictData ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT participant_name, strategy_name FROM ConflictParticipants INNER JOIN ConflictResolutionStrategies ON ConflictParticipants.strategy_id = ConflictResolutionStrategies.id;
SELECT feedback_text FROM ConflictFeedback WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionStrategies;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM ConflictResolutionStrategies WHERE success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT data_id, outcome FROM ConflictData ORDER BY date_collected DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_name, strategy_name FROM ConflictParticipants JOIN ConflictResolutionStrategies ON ConflictParticipants.strategy_id = ConflictResolutionStrategies.id;
SELECT feedback_text FROM ConflictFeedback WHERE data_id IN (SELECT data_id FROM ConflictData WHERE outcome = 'resolved');
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, description FROM conflict_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM resolution_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50;
SELECT survey_id, question_id, response FROM survey_results WHERE response LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate FROM conflict_resolution_strategies WHERE success_rate >= 0.8;
SELECT log_id, description FROM conflict_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM resolution_metrics JOIN conflict_logs ON resolution_metrics.log_id = conflict_logs.log_id WHERE success_rate >= 0.7;
SELECT member_name, team_role FROM team_members WHERE team_role IS NULL ORDER BY member_name ASC;
